entry.key: Log level when file not found

entry.value: SELECT flight_id, flight_no, scheduled_departure::text, scheduled_arrival::text, departure_airport, arrival_airport, status, aircraft_code, actual_departure::text, actual_arrival::text, now()::text AS load_dt FROM ${source_schema_name}.${source_table_name};

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ${target_schema_name}.external_${target_table_name}; CREATE TABLE ${target_schema_name}.external_${target_table_name} ( flight_id int NOT NULL, flight_no text NOT NULL, scheduled_departure timestamptz NOT NULL, scheduled_arrival timestamptz NOT NULL, departure_airport bpchar(3) NOT NULL, arrival_airport bpchar(3) NOT NULL, status varchar(20) NOT NULL, aircraft_code bpchar(3) NOT NULL, actual_departure timestamptz NULL, actual_arrival timestamptz NULL, load_dt timestamptz NOT NULL); COPY ${target_schema_name}.external_${target_table_name} FROM '#{pg_share_path}/#{db_source_name}/${source_table_name}/${filename}' DELIMITER '~' CSV HEADER; INSERT INTO ${target_schema_name}.${target_table_name} SELECT flight_id, flight_no, scheduled_departure, scheduled_arrival, departure_airport, arrival_airport, status, aircraft_code, actual_departure, actual_arrival, load_dt FROM ${target_schema_name}.external_${target_table_name}; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ${target_schema_name}.external_${target_table_name};
